comments.body:
so should it then read?:
```ts
export interface FlyoutProps {
    anchor?: React.RefObject<HTMLElement>;// ideally a HTMLAnchorElement
```

No - flyout doesn't want a `React.RefObject<HTMLElement>`, it wants `HTMLElement`. 

i.e. instead of passing `<Flyout anchor={ref} />` you now need to pass `<Flyout anchor={ref.current} />`
